div.p: Translation provided by the edition [...] of an outlet leading to [...][to the] [...] of the village: 66 1/3; [...] of the breach in the [...] leading to the [...] to the west of the village [...]. Total: in water: 400. [...] of the breach of the old [dyke?][...] running south to north [...] the canal of the [...].

To Phanesis, son of Nechthoys, for cutting and transporting the wood for building the stables [...]: 6 at a rate of 1/2 for 5 ob. Tybi 2[.]; in bronze 11 [...]. [...] of stones: 4[...] 2 1/2 cubits for the loosening [...] which is being rebuilt [...] in the navigable canal [...] at a rate of [...] 6 dr. 2 ob. Hathyr 9: 5 dr. 2 ob. He has handed it over to Phanesis, the workman. To Phanesis, son of Nechthoys, for cutting and transporting the wood for the stone works for the stone which will be moved [...][from] the place near the shrine of the Dioskouroi, for [...] [.] 1/2 cubits: 4 at a rate of 1 dr. 2 ob., i.e. 5 dr. 2 ob. and of streets [...] 444 [...].
